description: This file defines a Flutter StatefulWidget for creating and editing notes, including UI elements and logic for saving notes via a provider.

classes.name: NoteEditorPage
classes.description: A Flutter widget for creating or editing a note, supporting input fields for title and content, and saving functionality.

classes.name: _NoteEditorPageState
classes.description: State class managing the logic and UI for NoteEditorPage, including controllers, save state, and build method.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes text controllers with existing note data if available, adds listeners to update save state.

methods.name: _updateSaveState
methods.description: Updates the _canSave flag based on whether title or content is non-empty.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Handles saving the note, either creating a new one or updating an existing one, and provides user feedback.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the page, including AppBar, TextFields, and status info.
